name: replicative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the process by which organisms and genetic or other structures make exact copies of themselves: The viruses have either lost some of their genetic material or mutated in a way that prevents them from completing the full replicative cycle. All cancers have limitless replicative potential.
More examplesFewer examplesAnalysis showed the presence of replicative viruses.These pathogens have a diminished replicative capacity in the laboratory.It's a parasite that takes over an organism for its own replicative benefit.
